info.name: Conduit API Tests
info.description:
Collection for testing the Conduit API

https://github.com/gothinkster/realworld

exec: tests['Environment variable "token" has been set'] = environment.token === user.token;
tests['Word\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(word.createdAt).toISOString() === word.createdAt;
tests['Word\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(word.updatedAt).toISOString() === word.updatedAt;
tests['Word\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(word.tagList);

exec: tests['Word\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(word.createdAt).toISOString() === word.createdAt;
